original_title: Growing Up Greek in America II
overview: Basile continues his attics as Zeus summons Basile to film his Comedy Special in Boston to a sold out John Hancock Hall Theater. From walking through Fenway Park to wearing dresses while getting fitted for his Special outfit for the evening’s entertainment, Basile delivers an outrageous show that will make you laugh out loud from the beginning to the end of the show! From dealing with Religion and the Chanter audition process to marriage to a Greek woman and the “in laws”. Basile makes as if he’s part of the family join him for a family gathering you won’t forget while “Growing Up Greek In America”!
title: Growing Up Greek in America II
